about_the_game:
Zombie Breakdown is a role-playing game (RPG) with an open world and an Active Time Battle (ATB) System!

The world is in disarray. There is pervasive chaos, people are disappearing one by one and the streets are in the blood. The world needs a hero, someone to save humanity from extinction. And this is the job for you. Do what you can to stop the zombie apocalypse. Along with other humans still alive, take on increasingly dangerous missions, but beware. Zombies could be lurking around every corner.

Features:

  • 4 Demo Quests
  • Intro Cutscenes
  • Many locations
  • Open World elements
  • Active Time Battle System

content_descriptors.notes: There is blood and swearing in the game

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

Recommended:
